Here's an explanation of companionship. If|you invite another player's character to join|you, and they accept, you become friends with|
|that character. It's also called "forming a|party. If you're a member of a party, you can|fight battles together, advance in the story,|
|and use a special chat that only your friends|can hear... The story progresses according to|the story leader's progress... If you're on|
|the same level as the story leader, you'll|progress through the story together... If you|want to leave your friends, you can do so by|
|choosing "leave friends" from "friends" in|the Operation command...
